[by:小陀螺Tony]
[ti:You (Evan Berg Remix)]

[by:九九Lrc歌词网～www.99Lrc.net]
[00:00.69]You got me, baby, I got you back
[00:03.38]Looking at you, thinking about
[00:05.86]All of the ways that you know me
[00:07.93]I can't get enough

[00:13.81]Good and the bad, making it last
[00:16.35]We are what I want and I want what I already got
[00:19.89]
[00:21.51]When you come through the room
[00:25.05]I know that you know
[00:27.42]If you fall, I will be there
[00:32.29]Let's light up like the moon
[00:35.93]Yeah, we're taking off, make it even brighter
[00:42.46]
[00:42.72]That's what I like about you (hey-ey)
[00:45.70]That's what I li-li-li-li-like
[00:47.93]Tell me what you gonna do
